title: Regional Receptions  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Admission & Aid Types of Admission Visit DePaul Tuition Room & Board Scholarships Financial Aid Veteran Student Test Credit & Placement Check Your Application Status Admitted Students Deadlines Immunization Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Regional Receptions Regional Receptions Register to Attend a Regional Reception DePaul isn’t just another university — it’s where campus meets city; where learning meets doing; and where theory meets practice. But it’s more than that — it’s the opportunity to get a jump on experiencing the real world as soon as you start college, not when you finish. Want to know more? Join us at a regional reception, and we’ll answer all of your questions about our application and financial aid processes, our range of cutting-edge academic programs, and the unique benefits of attending college in the world-class city of Chicago. Register for this event: Thursday, March 31, 2016: Orange County, California Tuesday, April 5, 2016: Los Angeles (area), California Monday, April 18, 2016: San Diego, California For any questions, contact Chonquita Jones at (800) 4-DePaul, ext. 529​74 orcjones28@depaul.edu.
